languages.text: "Поторопись. Вижу нитки на тебе расходятся — так и лицо недолго потерять. А обратно даже мне его не пришить".
"You should hurry. I can see your threads are loosening. You might lose your face that way, and even I won't be able to sew it back on."
languages.original_text: "Поторопись. Вижу нитки на тебе расходятся — так и лицо недолго потерять. А обратно даже мне его не пришить".

traits.locale_text: "You have to hurry. I can see your threads are loosening. You can lose your face that way. And even I won't be able to sew it back on."
"You have to hurry. I can see your threads are loosening. You can lose your face that way. And even I won't be able to sew it back on."
"You should hurry. I can see your threads are loosening. You might lose your face that way, and even I won't be able to sew it back on."
"You should hurry. I can see your threads are loosening. You might lose your face that way, and even I won't be able to sew it back on."
"You should hurry. I can see your threads are loosening. You might lose your face that way, and even I won't be able to sew it back on."
"You should hurry. I can see your threads are loosening. You might lose your face that way, and even I won't be able to sew it back on."

languages.text: 「急いだほうがいいですよ。あなたの糸がほつれてきているのが見えます。そのままだと顔を失くしてしまうかもしれません。そうなれば、私でももう縫い直せませんよ」
languages.original_text: "You should hurry. I can see your threads are loosening. You might lose your face that way, and even I won't be able to sew it back on."

traits.locale_text: 「急いだほうがいいですよ。あなたの糸がほつれてきているのが見えます。そのままだと顔を失くしてしまうかもしれません。そうなれば、私でももう縫い直せませんよ」

languages.text: "Çabuk ol. İpin ucu kaçıyor. Böyle giderse yüzünü kaybedeceksin, sonra ben bile toparlayamam bilesin!"
languages.original_text: "You should hurry. I can see your threads are loosening. You might lose your face that way, and even I won't be able to sew it back on."

traits.locale_text: "Çabuk ol. İpin ucu kaçıyor. Böyle giderse yüzünü kaybedeceksin, sonra ben bile toparlayamam bilesin!"

languages.text: «Deberías darte prisa. Se te están soltando los hilos. A este ritmo, perderás la cara y ni siquiera yo podré volver a cosértela».
languages.original_text: "You should hurry. I can see your threads are loosening. You might lose your face that way, and even I won't be able to sew it back on."

traits.locale_text: «Deberías darte prisa. Se te están soltando los hilos. A este ritmo, perderás la cara y ni siquiera yo podré volver a cosértela».

languages.text: “你得快点。我看得出来，你脸上的丝线已经松动了。这样下去的话，你的脸恐怕就要掉了，就算是我也缝不回去。”
languages.original_text: "You should hurry. I can see your threads are loosening. You might lose your face that way, and even I won't be able to sew it back on."

traits.locale_text: “你得快点。我看得出来，你脸上的丝线已经松动了。这样下去的话，你的脸恐怕就要掉了，就算是我也缝不回去。”

languages.text: « Vous devriez vous hâter. Je vois d'ici vos fils qui se desserrent. Si ça continue, vous allez perdre votre visage et même moi, je ne pourrai plus rien pour le recoudre. »
languages.original_text: "You should hurry. I can see your threads are loosening. You might lose your face that way, and even I won't be able to sew it back on."

traits.locale_text: « Vous devriez vous hâter. Je vois d'ici vos fils qui se desserrent. Si ça continue, vous allez perdre votre visage et même moi, je ne pourrai plus rien pour le recoudre. »

languages.text: "Ihr solltet Euch beeilen. Ich kann sehen, wie Eure Fäden sich lockern. Ihr könntet dadurch Euer Gesicht verlieren, und selbst ich könnte es nicht wieder annähen."
languages.original_text: "You should hurry. I can see your threads are loosening. You might lose your face that way, and even I won't be able to sew it back on."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr solltet Euch beeilen. Ich kann sehen, wie Eure Fäden sich lockern. Ihr könntet dadurch Euer Gesicht verlieren, und selbst ich könnte es nicht wieder annähen."
